alreadySubmitted: You have previously filled the Investors Enquiry Form or have chosen not to fill it. If you would like us to contact you, please select Yes to contact you, or No to ask a different question.
botbuilder:default_choice: I didn't understand. Please choose an option from the list
thanks: Thanks, please feel free to ask more questions.
choice_prompt: please select from the options above
manualHelpText:
I’m sorry but I didn’t understand your question.
Please select one of the below choices so I can help you further.
firstNamePlease: Great, please can I have your full name
firstOnlyNamePlease: Great, please can I have your first name
LastOnlyNamePlease: Thanks, can I have your last name please
welcomeText: Hi, how may i help you?
welcomeTextinmiddle: Is there anything else I can help you with today?
validMobile: please enter a valid mobile number
validEmail: Please enter a valid email [format xxxxx@xxxxx.xxx].
enterEmailCRM: Please enter the email you use to login to our Resident Portal
enterEmailNoCRM: Please enter your email so I can submit an access request on your behalf and answer any further questions
enterBankEmail:
Thanks, I will ask you a quick series of questions to verify your identity. 

 This service is for informational purposes only, rest assured that no financial transactions or commitments will be made as well as no financial disclosures or any other sensitive information will be released. 

 Please enter your email
askForEmail: Hi, please let me know whats is your name
greetingAgain: Hi again %s, how may i help you?
greetingAsk: Hi %s, how may I help you today?
selectYourLanguage:
Hi, I’m your personal assistant to answer your questions about our Banking Services. You can ask me simple questions like “How can I apply for a Credit Card?”, or “What are current offers”, or similar questions. At any time, you can ask to see the Main Menu by simply typing 'Main Menu' 

   ‘السلام عليكم، انا مساعدك الشخصي الآلي ويمكنك ان تسألني عن خدماتنا المصرفية. يمكنك طرح أسئلة بسيطة مثل ‘كيف يمكنني الحصول على بطاقة اعتماد’ أو ‘هل تقدمون أي عروض’ أو ما شابه. بإمكانك الرجوع إلى قائمة عرض رئيسية عبر كتابة عبارة ‘اللائحة الرئيسية’.
selectYourLanguageStart: Please select your language | برجاء أختيار لغتك المفضله
getMobileNumber: Please give me your mobile number
getZones: Which zone are you more interested in?
getSectors: Please select the sector that best describes your activity.
getOperations: Please select what type of operation you wish to establish.
getHowYouHeard: Last question, can you tell me how you heard about the properties in Advance Bank?
cannotUnderstand: Sorry i couldn't understand what you are saying
addComment: Please write any comments or instructions for us to keep in mind when contacting you
EmailCRM: Hi Mr. %s we have your information already and we will contact you shortly to process your application
thanksInquiry:
Thanks, we have recorded your Enquiry and one of our consultants will be in touch with you very soon.

A copy of your enquiry has been forwarded to %s.
maybeinInvestor:
I see you are interested in knowing more about the exciting investment opportunities with Advance Bank. 

 Would you like to give us some quick details, and we will have one of our investment consultants reach you for a full presentation?
whichService: Please ask me any question and I will do my best to answer it, type “Main Menu” at anytime to restart our chat
getServices: Please select any of the below services to better serve you.
getServicesDynamic: Please select any of the below services to better serve you.
areYouInterestedinProperty: Are you interested in this property
areYouMemeber: Thank you, I’ll be happy to help you today. Please let me know if you’re an existing customer
defaultIntent: Sorry I couldn’t understand what you are saying, please rephrase your question and try using direct short questions
nothanks: Thank you for banking with AdvancaBank, we look forward to serving you!
endofservice: Thank you for your application, May I help you with anything else today?
nationalityPlease: please can I know your nationality
dateofbirth: Please enter your date of birth
dateofbirthformat: Please enter your date of birth [dd-mm-yyyy]
NotValidUser: I’m sorry but I don’t recognize your information. Please call our support Hotline or visit your nearest branch, or try again.
CreditCardStarttext: Hi, can I help you find the right card for you? Please select View all Credit Card option below
LoanStarttext: Hi, can I help you find the right loan for you? Please select View all Loan option below
getCreditCardServices:
If you’re looking to find the right Credit Card for you, you’ve reached the right place. 

 Please select one of the options below so I can help you find the perfect choice.
getLoanServices:
Welcome to our Loans section, where we will help you find the perfect loan for your needs. 

 Please select one of the options below so I can help you find the perfect choice.
addInquiry: Please type your inquiry and our Service Agents will reply to your by email or phone within 3 business days
